channel.title: Posts on xor-gate
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on xor-gate

item.title: September Week 2
item.description: Trademark Actions Against the PostgreSQL Community September 13th (Link) (Comments) An Internet decides that he knows better than some open source community how to manage that community’s trademarks. This, in his mind, gives him the right to file for those trademarks around the world. The community, as well as HN, politely tell him to fuck off. HN then breaks into a fight over whether mailing lists are better than forums in any way other than keeping new users out.
